sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea"> <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <description>Using current, GR, or any URL Note that it doesn't HAVE to go at the end of the script!</description> <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-06-12">4a084178db8ab3c0a8a21637059619a6</episode> <name>action.setRedirectURL</name> <script><![CDATA[action.setRedirectURL('/mydashboard.do'); current.state = 3; current.update(); gs.addInfoMessage('Welcome');]]></script> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-06-12 12:15:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>17ee2cb0db0ab3c0a8a2163705961997</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-06-12 14:26:56</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_cls_idea> </record_update>
